net.big_oh.common.jdbc.event
Class ConnectionInstantiationEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      net.big_oh.common.jdbc.event.ConnectionInstantiationEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ConnectionInstantiationEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

An event class that encapsulates the details of a request to instantiate a new database Connection.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

ConnectionInstantiationEvent

public ConnectionInstantiationEvent(java.sql.Driver proxyDriver,
                                    java.sql.Driver delegateDriver,
                                    java.lang.String connectionUrl,
                                    java.util.Properties connectionProperties)
Construct a class that encapsulates the details of a request to instantiate a new database Connection.

Parameters:
proxyDriver - The instance of JdbcDriverProxy from which the new Connection was requested.
delegateDriver - The Driver used "under the hood" to create the new Connection.
connectionUrl - The URL of the database to be connected to. This is the URL that the delegateDriver uses to create a Connection.
connectionProperties - The connection properties used by the delegateDriver to create a Connection.
Method Detail

getProxyDriver

public java.sql.Driver getProxyDriver()
Returns:
The instance of JdbcDriverProxy from which the new Connection was requested.

getDelegateDriver

public java.sql.Driver getDelegateDriver()
Returns:
The Driver used "under the hood" to create the new Connection.

getConnectionUrl

public java.lang.String getConnectionUrl()
Returns:
The URL of the database to be connected to. This is the URL that the delegateDriver uses to create a Connection.

getConnectionProperties

public java.util.Properties getConnectionProperties()
Returns:
The connection properties used by the delegateDriver to create a Connection.
